Name: ChangedReservationNotification
Description: Email sent to restaurant's team when reservation has been changed
SUBJECT: The reservation has been changed
PREHEADER: Reservation on {{booking.ReservationDateTime}} for {{booking.partySize}} {{booking.reservationName}} has been changed.

ContentTemplate.sms: Reservation on {{booking.ReservationDateTime}} for {{booking.partySize}} {{booking.reservationName}} has been changed.
ContentTemplate.push: Reservation on {{booking.ReservationDateTime}} for {{booking.partySize}} {{booking.reservationName}} has been changed.

MAINMESSAGE.content: The following reservation has been changed:
